title: Benefits of MICE Services | Boost Your Events – MICEkart

headings.text: MICEkart.com Partners Advantages- Privileges of being our partner.
MICEkart.com Client Advantages – Privileges of being a client
Partner Modules- The Solution for each Partner Category
© 2024 AstrikaInfotech.com . All rights reserved. Privacy Policy

paragraphs: MICEkart.com is aimed at simplifying the way the industry transacts M.I.C.E business, by providing an easy to use Technology platform for our partners & clients to effectively use and engage with each other, ensuring value creation at all times

We help our partners transform & grow their businesses by providing an effective technology infrastructure to reach out to prospective clients, Our clients are also able to leverage our easy to use M.I.C.E marketplace to ensure they are able to effectively search for the best options across Hotels, Merchandise solutions, Artist, Team building activities, Event solutions & M.I.C.E packages and plan their Travel Initiative optimally. With constant focus on research and product development combined with an easy to use & highly transparent marketplace solution, MICEkart.com aims to create an ecosystem which will transform M.I.C.E business by creating value always.
If it’s MICE, then we’ve got all it all MICEkart.com
No marketplace for vendors and consumers of M.I.C.E. products and services to make effective M.I.C.E. transactions.
Unprecedented cost as a result of various inbuilt commissions at the EMC level and lack of transparency.
Absence of an accurate M.I.C.E. review mechanism to make prudent and efficient choices.
Inability for MICE partners to provide deals during low business periods to increase sales
Inability for MICE buyers to benefit from partner deals and reduce their costs.
High dependence on Travel agents and Event companies due to limited options being available and affordable.
Extensive man hours wasted as a result of inaccurate and inept M.I.C.E planning.
A MICEkart.com partner need not have a slack period again! MICEkart.com provides a smart platform to offer competitive deals and irresistible seasonal promotions and boost sales all year round!
A MICEkart.com partner can reach out to our entire client base spread across diverse industries & locations around the country.
Generate awareness about special, innovative offerings and show them why you're the best!
MICEkart.com gives you an additional channel to showcase your products & services and capture incremental sales.
Extensive, substantial and targeted online and offline marketing ensures your products and services get noticed by the relevant decision-makers/buyers.
Show your commitment to great service, with customer ratings and testimonials.
Choose amongst a wide range of the current products and services, available on a single platform MICEkart.com. and make it easy with our smart database search feature.
Hotel deals, distinctive team building solutions, economical and unlimited options across artiste & merchandise, OTC event solutions & lot more.
Virtual MICE solutions - Virtual Events, Virtual Team building activities & other Virtual MICE solutions.
User friendly platform for planning M.I.C.E. Travel and Events.
100% transparency through our efficient & easy to use RFP process connecting the MICE buyers directly to our partners.
Eliminate escalated costs which result from M.I.C.E. travel companies’ high inbuilt commissions.
View hotel deals and packages, which would suit your particular requirements, with respect to banqueting and rooming facilities.
Connect with the best team building professionals in the market, to organise team building, bonding and development activities for you teams.
A novel platform to connect with the best-in-class artistes for your events.

Your search for premium gifting solutions for your MICE travel events, Takeaway gifts, Trophies for RNR, festive gifting, incentive gifting solution, etc. ends at our one-stop-shop. Branding, Packaging & logistics are effectively managed by us.
Select from a plethora of options for event solutions- Conference setups, RNR / Gala Dinner setups & innovative themes for the above.
A holistic solution for all your international and domestic M.I.C.E travel and event initiatives.

Hotels can list themselves on MICEkart.com. A micro-page is created for each hotel capturing all details of the hotel including Rooms, Banquets, Dining options & Other features, along with a picture gallery.
Hotels can also upload MICE packages, customize offerings, give freebies & offer deals for Valley periods to increase their sales.
MICE buyers can search for hotels basis their requirements of Location, Rooms required, Banquet requirements, Hotel category & get the exact match for their requirements
MICE buyers can browse through Hotel micro-page post search results & understand more of the Hotel to make decision on qualifying hotels
Clients can view deals & packages offered by Hotels.
Raise query through RFQ module available online. Query reaches directly to Sales Manager/ DOS at Hotel.
Our Client will receive availability & quotes instantly & directly from Hotels.
Mobile app for every Hotel to ensure quick reverts from Hotel.
Sign contract & book hotel for your MICE event directly & online.
A - 703,Neelkanth Business park, Vidyavhihar (west), Mumbai 400086

metadata.description: Discover the benefits of MICE services! MICEkart helps businesses with seamless corporate event planning, conferences, incentive travel, and destination management.
